roleset.name: reach the bottom
roleset.note: BOTTOM_OUT-V NOTES: Frames file for 'bottom (out)' based on sentences in financial subcorpus. No Verbnet entry. (from bottom.01-v predicate notes)

example.name: unmodified
example.text: Freight rates are bottoming out and starting to rebound.

example.name: with time and place
example.text: He expects stocks to decline an additional 5% to 30%, with the Dow perhaps bottoming out between 2000 and 2100 ``between now and June.''
